alert.note: Alert for Houston; Madison; Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:17PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Trinity, southwestern Houston, southeastern Madison and northern Walker Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 417 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Madisonville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Riverside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Texas.
